medical_history.chief_complaint: Asymptomatic serpiginous lesion on the left foot.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The lesion had been present for several weeks. Initially interpreted as creeping eruption; treatment with 10% tiabendazole cream showed no response.
medical_history.social_history: Returned from a journey to the Caribbean island of Guadeloupe 6 months previously.
